A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best Star Wars movie since Empire Strikes Back.\n\nDon't come into this movie expecting theories to turn into realities. If you have a favorite side character\, don't expect them to be the new Big Deal. Han is just going to laugh at you. The movie subverts expectations and while it has some slight missteps in the pacing\, the story and the message explode onto the screen with the best visuals and audio of any Star Wars movie to-date.
